attributes.action: Remove David Cameron from his seat in UK government
attributes.additional_details:
After the release of the Panama papers David Cameron spent a week avoiding questions and denying his involvement regarding his offshore acounts, only to later come back with an explanation full of holes.

The recent announcement of 9 million being spent from taxpayers money on a leaflet for every home stating why the UK should stay in the EU left many people outraged at such a waste of money, however Cameron completely supports this.

#resignCameron
attributes.background: Since the release of the Panama papers and the recent announcement that 9 million in tax payers money is to be spent on sending a leaflet to every home in the UK regarding staying in the EU. It has become evident that David Cameron Is no longer a suitable figure to lead the UK.

rejection.details:
As you might already know, the Prime Minister of the UK is not chosen by the UK Government or Parliament.

After a general election, the Queen decides who to invite to form a Government. In practice, this is usually the leader of the political party that wins the most seats in a general election. You can find out more about this here:

http://www.royal.gov.uk/MonarchUK/QueenandGovernment/QueenandPrimeMinister.aspx
